Title: Cloud Swing in Turquoise & Black Matte Finish

Description: Since 2014 Zecado has achieved many milestones, and is symbolically known as modern e-retailers with full guarantee and reliability to take care of clients true gifting and shopping sentiments and to provide genuine products. The Brand believes in making reliable relations with our customers to reach to that goal we always look forward to provide best services & products to our customers. A swing is a hanging seat, often found at playgrounds for children and now also popularly used as items of indoor furniture. The seat of a swing may be suspended from chains or ropes. Once a swing is in motion, it continues to oscillate like a pendulum until external interference or drag brings it to a halt.
